name: Can't Do That While Stunned (10 player)
descr: Defeat the Assembly of Iron without allowing Stormcaller Brundir to damage anyone with Chain Lightning or Lightning Whirl in 10-player mode.
tooltip:
Can\'t Do That While Stunned (10 player)

Defeat the Assembly of Iron without allowing Stormcaller Brundir to damage anyone with Chain Lightning or Lightning Whirl in 10-player mode.
